page.title: 17A SCHOOL OUTING
page.content: TOMORROW WE ARE GOING ON A SCHOOL OUTING TO{THE SEALIFE CENTRE}AT CONNEL NEAR OBAN. WE WILL SEE LOTS OF SEA FISH AND PLANTS. THERE WILL BE TANKS FULL OF SEA FISH, LOBSTERS, CRABS, OCTOPUS AND SHELL FISH. AFTER THAT WE ARE GOING TO GANAVAN BEACH AND THEN INTO OBAN TO VISIT THE SHOPS. THE BUS WILL CALL AT THE SCHOOL TOMORROW AT NINE O'CLOCK AND WE SHOULD ARRIVE AT ABOUT HALF PAST TEN. WE WILL LOOK AT THE FISH AND SEE THE SEALS BEING FED AND THEN WE WILL GO TO THE BEACH TO HAVE OUR LUNCH AND ALSO GO SWIMMING AND BUILDING SAND CASTLES IF THE WEATHER IS GOOD. IN OBAN I WILL SPEND MY POCKET MONEY IN THE SHOPS. AFTER THAT WE WILL GET ON THE BUS AND COME BACK TO SCHOOL. { {BY LINDA ANDERSON AGED 7.
